name: Goblin Invasion (Sathariel)
description:
Game realised during our studies at the Gaming Campus.

Goal was improve our coding in C# through Unity, Using the S.O.L.I.D principles.

With this projet we've learn things such as :

  • Using Twitch API
  • Using Google Sheet API
  • Using Asynchrone coroutines
  • UML
  • Design patterns

Game Realised by :

  • Erwan Eeps
  • David Nguyen
  • Léo Chabert
